General.Name: Red Sky Energy Ltd
General.Description: Red Sky Energy Limited engages in the exploration and development of oil and gas properties in the United States and Australia. Its flagship project is the Killanoola Oil project, which covers approximately 17.5 square kilometers located in Otway Basin, South Australia. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.
